name: @terrazul/cli
description: Terrazul CLI (tz): package manager for AI agent configuration bundles

scripts.test-workflow: npm run test-workflow:clean && npm run test-workflow:extract && npm run test-workflow:publish && npm run test-workflow:install
scripts.test-workflow:clean: rm -rf test-workflow-output && mkdir -p test-workflow-output && cd test-workflow-output && npm run tz -- init
scripts.test-workflow:publish: cd test-workflow-output/package && npm run tz -- publish
scripts.test-workflow:install: cd test-workflow-output && npm run tz -- install '@test/workflow-demo@1.0.0'
scripts.test-cleanup: rm -rf test-* extracted-* my-package demo-package .claude ~/.terrazul && rm -f *.tgz fake-registry.js && rm -rf test-registry/storage test-registry/packages.json
scripts.codex-impl: pnpm run save-agents && ln -sfn agent_files/implement.AGENTS.md AGENTS.md && codex --model 'gpt-5-codex' --yolo -c model_reasoning_summary_format=experimental -c model_reasoning_effort=high --search '@'
scripts.codex-research: pnpm run save-agents && ln -sfn agent_files/research.AGENTS.md AGENTS.md && codex --model 'gpt-5-codex' --yolo -c model_reasoning_summary_format=experimental -c model_reasoning_effort=high --search '@'
scripts.codex-plan: pnpm run save-agents && ln -sfn agent_files/plan.AGENTS.md AGENTS.md && codex --model 'gpt-5-codex' --yolo -c model_reasoning_summary_format=experimental -c model_reasoning_effort=high --search '@'
scripts.codex-debug: pnpm run save-agents && ln -sfn agent_files/debug.AGENTS.md AGENTS.md && codex --model 'gpt-5-codex' --yolo -c model_reasoning_summary_format=experimental -c model_reasoning_effort=high --search '@'
scripts.codex-restore: [ -L AGENTS.md ] && rm AGENTS.md || true; [ -f .AGENTS.md.bak ] && mv -f .AGENTS.md.bak AGENTS.md || true
